title: lmao zed is such a useless champion
body:
like there is no reason to even be playing him over all of these freelo fotm mages mid lane. karthus and anivia just get 100 cs by 8 minutes by farming everything in sight including the jungle.

and if an unkillable tank comes into play with shit tons of damage? (ie ionic spark shen) lol good luck considering that there is no item to stop hp stacking in the game.

also all these people pretending he doesn't need massive as fuck armor pen to be useful in the least. (not that he ever is, if anything he can try to be a suicide bomber that cant aim his plane half the time since he never kills anything)

can we buff zed so he can be useful? please?

replies.body: Sweet christ... Guys, I lost the keys to my time machine, can someone please return them? Kinda scary back here in 2012.

Zed needs too much gold too fast

hes too easily countered mid lane by mages who can rush chainvest and complete zhonyas, which is all of them. And then you have Morde who starts 13 hp pots and rushes revolver/tabi/sunfire/FoN and nobody can fucking damage him. Zed needs massive buffs imo

> [{quoted}](name=HateDaddy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-20T03:43:52.892+0000)
>
> Zed needs too much gold too fast
> 
> hes too easily countered mid lane by mages who can rush chainvest and complete zhonyas, which is all of them. And then you have Morde who starts 13 hp pots and rushes revolver/tabi/sunfire/FoN and nobody can fucking damage him. Zed needs massive buffs imo

Actually, a lot of mages who rush Hourglass have less damage and no mana for sustain. Zed already has easy waveclear and endless sustain, so he can apply incredible pressure in lane and avoid ganks quite easily. If you have trouble with him, it's because you play his ultimate only. I had a game where I was bard, I hit the enemy mid laner 3 times while zed hid nearby with full hp. The enemy laner had 30% hp, too much for braum, but if Zed came did one auto for stun, and then a couple more (+ any skill) would have been kill. He was sitting watching me defend myself for a while before the enemy decided to run after i landed the 3rd stack, so i know he wasn't on cd for all his skills. After enemy ran what was his excuse for not helping "I didn't have ulti"
People that pick Zed for his unstoppable ultimate, are gonna bitch about Zhonyas blocking it, but fast building Zhonya hurts mid lane mages, and since when can Zed not ultimate the ADC?

Zed can be countered, but who should be able to be, like everyone else, but he counters MOST mid laners, which is why so many noobs pick him first. I had 15 games with 14 losses, and each time Zed or Kata was first pick mid. It happened at least 10 times to be honest, but I was shocked at the frequency of the bronze picks even if it was silver 2. Zed is not as over powered as people say, because he can be stopped, but he does not need buffs, not at all, since he is still such a safe pick and reliable champ. Only a noobs pick him because he is SO powerful, that the get owned. He is this seasons master yi, people that can't play pick him for easy kills but lose the game

As for needing gold fast, he outtrades almost every other mid at level 1, why is he in such a rush, considering that he can proceed to out farm, stay in lane longer to continue to farm, and swiftly roam. He earns gold faster than most mid laners, so it doesn't matter if he (like ALL assassins) needs to build gold fast - since I notice that if they don't get the first kill or a kill within first 8 minutes they tend to fall behind, but Zed is one of the few assassins that can farm well (unlike Kata or Akali that NEEDs to get those kills)

> [{quoted}](name=MrYorky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=000300030001,timestamp=2015-04-20T15:10:21.917+0000)
>
> ...

This isn't a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=Elo Thief,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=0003000300010000,timestamp=2015-04-20T16:56:38.029+0000)
>
> This isn't a joke.

They think its a joke because they just want TF/Lux/Anivia every game so they can continue to collect elo. God forbid a champion like Zed, who is hard to play unlike those 3, ever gets buffed enough to contend with them.

Umm, yeah, this comment is... well let me put it this way, after 20 games with having a first pick or insta lock Zed in more than 12 of them, and on the enemy team in at least 2 mote, I can't see how your point is relevant. Zed is spam picked like crazy, while anirva and TF appear to be niche picks at the moment, at least with my recent experience. Even normally I see him a lot, but recently it is almost literally all the time. SO yeah, I can't agree that it has anything to do with  only seeing TF and Anirva (lux is pretty common) every game, since we hardly ever see them in any game, cause league is dominated by Zed's right now

> [{quoted}](name=Apollocliptic,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=000300030001000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-22T15:26:53.122+0000)
>
> Umm, yeah, this comment is... well let me put it this way, after 20 games with having a first pick or insta lock Zed in more than 12 of them, and on the enemy team in at least 2 mote, I can't see how your point is relevant. Zed is spam picked like crazy, while anirva and TF appear to be niche picks at the moment, at least with my recent experience. Even normally I see him a lot, but recently it is almost literally all the time. SO yeah, I can't agree that it has anything to do with  only seeing TF and Anirva (lux is pretty common) every game, since we hardly ever see them in any game, cause league is dominated by Zed's right now


It's people like you thy make Gameplay and Balance look bad. 

Did you honestly think this thread was serious? Did you actually read the whole thing? General Discussion is smarter than you guys, and that's sad.

eh What? I make Gameplay and balance look bad because I gave a serious response? the people that make this look bad are the ones that arbitrarily start being offensive for no reason, but hey, maybe I'm not that smart, I completely have failed to see a point in what you just said 

If your point is that I'm making a serious response to a joke, I'll counter with the fact that many people "DO" believe Zed is a skill based, and many don't, joke or not the opinion exists, and therefore there is no reason to assume one way or the other, I'm just making my point. 

If your point is that what I said was wrong? then what does it have to do with "reading the whole thing" because the "whole thing" becomes irrelevant to the point of what I was saying was wrong or not

I don't know what else you mean other than randomly talking trash, so I won't go into anymore detail then that, I am just fuming about the ludicrous number of zed's that have lead me to unwinnable games

on a side note: My point is very different from the others, so saying "you guys" lugs me in with them, or them in with me, either way is not fair.
Also, being "naive" has nothing to do with being "smart" I take people at their word, because what one guys thinks is a joke is serious to someone else, and every joke has an element of truth behind it, so while I might naively get sucked into debates about these things, has no indication of how smart I might be, one way or the other

> [{quoted}](name=Apollocliptic,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=00030003000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-22T17:16:02.664+0000)
>
> eh What? I make Gameplay and balance look bad because I gave a serious response? the people that make this look bad are the ones that arbitrarily start being offensive for no reason, but hey, maybe I'm not that smart, I completely have failed to see a point in what you just said 
> 
> If your point is that I'm making a serious response to a joke, I'll counter with the fact that many people "DO" believe Zed is a skill based, and many don't, joke or not the opinion exists, and therefore there is no reason to assume one way or the other, I'm just making my point. 
> 
> If your point is that what I said was wrong? then what does it have to do with "reading the whole thing" because the "whole thing" becomes irrelevant to the point of what I was saying was wrong or not
> 
> I don't know what else you mean other than randomly talking trash, so I won't go into anymore detail then that, I am just fuming about the ludicrous number of zed's that have lead me to unwinnable games
> 
> on a side note: My point is very different from the others, so saying "you guys" lugs me in with them, or them in with me, either way is not fair.
> Also, being "naive" has nothing to do with being "smart" I take people at their word, because what one guys thinks is a joke is serious to someone else, and every joke has an element of truth behind it, so while I might naively get sucked into debates about these things, has no indication of how smart I might be, one way or the other

There are countless daily threads with things saying that Zed is overpowered. Go post your opinion in them instead. You're saying that TF, Anivia and Lux are not seen much because of champions like Zed. You're trying to prove my point wrong for some reason, even though it is incredibly easy to tell that I'm joking around. (I thought Ionic Spark Shen would give it away more than it did)

At least GD can tell an obvious troll thread out most of the time. Most people on G&B take everything really serious for no reason. Did you honestly come here and expect a response from me saying, "Well you're right, but here is why you can be considered wrong too" 

The reason I asked if you read the whole thing was for that reason alone. If you acknowledged what the thread said you would realize there is no need to even try and post how I'm wrong, because there is no point to.

I replied because I wanted to reply, as I said, I just wanted to fume about Zed for a second. Besides the point still stands that even in a troll post people still make serious points from time to time, and other take it seriously along with those joking around. The only accurate way of determining a person's intent is through mannerisms and physical gestures, which is not apparent in monotone text.
also the earlier point that I make the section look bad because I am replying to a troll, also doesn't make sense, the troll post in itself is what would make the section look bad!?!

Finally, by my original post, I thought my intent was clear, I wasn't trying to start an argument, if you're being serious, I disagree, if you're not being serious, then I agree, either way Zed players are annoying. But maybe you couldn't understand my tone "Because this is all text based"

> [{quoted}](name=HateDaddy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=00030003000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-20T21:51:27.878+0000)
>
> They think its a joke because they just want TF/Lux/Anivia every game so they can continue to collect elo. God forbid a champion like Zed, who is hard to play unlike those 3, ever gets buffed enough to contend with them.

ikr at least Zed has to auto the minions to clear the wave while wasting ALL OF HIS ENERGY ON SKILLS.

Meanwhile Anivia  presses r. Tf presses Q. Lux uses her 20 something CD ult or e, etc ect mage abilities. And if they have blue? You better start praying for your minions because now they're probably at the CDR cap with Athenes.

Makes me sick trying to learn this complicated champion while they can just play league of legends on auto pilot easy mode.

Chances are, Anirva has died 4 times to Zed before level 6 lol

Lux Ulti has a stupidly short CD no argument there

but in terms of complexity. Anirva's is not so easy to use, her Ult is straight forward, but to be effective with her takes a lot of foresight, prediction and scenario manipulation

Again, I don't know about lux, she seems pretty easy, slow, root, ulti, repeat

Also I'd agree that Zed at least appears complicated, and not the Spam R most people say he is, I just disagree with the Anirva trash talk :D
All your posts in this thread are jokes.
Read carefully, my friend.

> [{quoted}](name=Auz the Ripper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=000300030000,timestamp=2015-04-20T15:08:33.780+0000)
>
> Read carefully, my friend.

LOL i know i went on a bit of a tangent, I was replying to your "joke" but also to a lot of other comments at the same time. My point was people either say he is over powered (unstoppable) or joke that he is easy to counter, but the truth is more complicated ^^

Still lol'ed.

Of course he needs armor pen, he's an assassin-- you just aren't good with him. He is fucking awesome when in the right hands, and snowballs like crazy. He is so OP and they should give him the Elise treatment and nerf the fk outta him. He should not spawn a shadow from his ult.

Even EUW knows it boys. Confirmed Zed is shit.

Hah picking him is considered a troll move now.
Every zed i've seen? Stomped.
I even tried him myself. Didn't feed or anything, I even "won" lane early due to jungler, but it didn't amount to anything. I had 45 armor pen with runes and items, fully charged bloodthirster, a dorans and some other tank items by the end of the game...
at no point in the game did i ever feel like i did anything well except for farming.
Farming is easy, but that's it. Seems like shadow is weakness.
This guy is hugely underwhelming, really, really, really bad champion design. 
Not only skill wise but his animation as well. Have you noticed how awkward his body moves when you stop and switch directions? It would work if he had oriona's waist...but rofl, he's ridiculous.
GD is leaking...
wait... what?

I'd be okay with Zed being stronger mid-late game but they need to do something about his horribly oppressive lane phase.

ohhhhh this from season 3 man..kha was actually good back then guys.. i swear

WAIT WAIT WAIT.

Since when did everyone think zed is terrible?

Im so fucking confused...
Season 2? ^__^

seriously, even champs built the wrong way are raping the shit out of zed. i saw an ap yi halve him from half a screen away, and survived his full combo including ult with 100% hp remaining. buff zed pls, he need sustain

> [{quoted}](name=Pluie Battante,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-04-22T04:34:18.709+0000)

If you have Blade of the Ruined King, and any form of armor penetration that tank is dead, literally a Youmis ghost blade, and either Last Whisper or Black Cleaver would destroy the tank.

Like I said, in Bronze (Where you are) he is moderately good. But he is basically garbage everywhere else.

I'm 100% serious.

> [{quoted}](name=Pluie Battante,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2015-04-22T04:40:20.109+0000)

Plus this wisdom is coming off of some one whom has only fourteen games played with only one season being this one in ranked. Stop please.


?

What do you think the armor pen page is? Leblanc?

This account was made in season 2 when my other account was banned for a week since I didn't know how strict being AFK was at the time. In other words, when I was around level 16 it was banned. I didn't buy this account. I doubt you were amazing when you started playing. (Looks like you still aren't) This is a secondary account for me, my main is already Diamond. Wouldnt you think my stats were good on this account for a reason? I literally just got this to 30 a few weeks ago fair and square by playing numerous games. I have no reason to buy one, since it's all easy to me. 

Stop trying to be a reddit detective and pay attention to what you're looking at. Maybe I should name my runes, "THIS PAGE IS FOR ZED" so people like you don't get (somehow) confused.

> [{quoted}](name=Pluie Battante,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=g5nAIxwy,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-04-22T15:17:13.984+0000)

It's not that it's hard, it's that I don't have the time on my hands to play this game 24/7 to climb the ranked ladder. I have work/school to deal with but of course you wanna pull the elo insult crap, but what ever.

Also those are the runes on my main. 

As well as every other high elo Zed.
